mapper.insert: insert into tbl_todolist(tdno, fk_mbr_seq, subject, contents, deadline) values(seq_todolist_tdno.nextval, to_number(#{fk_mbr_seq}), #{subject}, #{contents}, to_date(#{deadline}))
mapper.select: select tdno, fk_mbr_seq, subject, contents, important, fk_statno , to_char(registerday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as registerday , to_char(deadline, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as deadline from tbl_todolist where fk_mbr_seq = #{fk_mbr_seq}

select tdno, fk_mbr_seq, subject, contents, important, fk_statno , to_char(registerday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as registerday , to_char(deadline, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as deadline from tbl_todolist where tdno = #{tdno} and fk_mbr_seq = #{fk_mbr_seq}
select seq_workmanage_wmno.nextval as wmno from dual
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_workmanage(wmno, fk_wtno, requester, receivers, referrers, subject, contents, deadline, fk_statno) values (#{wmno}, #{fk_wtno}, #{requester}, #{receivers}, #{referrers}, #{subject}, #{contents}, to_date(#{deadline}), #{fk_statno})
insert into tbl_workmanage_mbr(fk_wmno, fk_wrno, fk_mbr_seq) values (#{fk_wmno}, #{fk_wrno}, to_number(#{fk_mbr_seq}))
mapper.select: select wmno, fk_wtno, requester, receivers, subject, fk_statno , to_char(registerday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as registerday , to_char(deadline, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as deadline from tbl_workmanage where wmno = #{wmno}
select mbr_seq, mbr_name from tbl_mbr where mbr_name like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
